heading: Today
text: Mostly cloudy.  A good chance of snow showers across the higher terrain north, scattered and mixing with afternoon rain in northern valleys and south.  Highs in the 30s north, near 40 in the Champlain Valley and south.  Southwest winds increasing to 10 to 15 mph from the Green Mountains west, gusting to 25 mph, less than 10 mph east.

heading: Tonight
text: Scattered snow showers, especially through the north and mountains, a dusting to 2 inches at higher elevations.  Mostly cloudy south and east.  Lows in the upper 20s to low 30s.  Winds southwest less than 10 mph, light in sheltered valleys.

heading: Thursday
text: Scattered snow showers, especially through the north and mountains, mixing with rain in the valleys.  Mostly cloudy south and east.  Highs in the 30s to near 40 north, 40 to 45 south.  Winds light, becoming west to northwest up to 10 mph.
